@qwerty_asdf I know how you feel bro. My own lover started a relationship with another man while still with me. While I never saw them directly have sex, I've seen them kiss and get intimate before. They didn't even try to hide it. She wanted me to continue our relationship while she was other guys and I wasn't gonna put up with that shit. Shit fucking hurts and it completely undermines your existence as a man. The only ntr I ever enjoy are the ones where the guy taking the girl is a genuinely good dude and the other guy is just eh, since most of the genre makes you feel like shit

@Nudeclear Seriously for the umpteenth time you cuck brainlet, how is someone a vanilla fan if he doesn't like NTR? And how is someone a NTR fan if he doesn't like vanilla? Is this more falsely dichotomous circular cuck logic at work? So for example, if I asked why someone is a "vanilla cuck", that's because he watches vanilla. How do you know he watches vanilla? Because he hates NTR. How does he hate NTR? Because he's a "vanilla cuck". See what I'm talking about?

@SchrodingerZ To "idealize" something means to make it look better than it really is, and that's different from story to story, but not in NTR. To make use of your previous argument, by virtue of your logic, all hentai has ideal sex scenes, sexualized characters and main focus exclusively on sexual relationships. However, your argument doesn't justify the existence of established plot or the given context in and of itself, outside of boundaries of sexual depiction. As different genres of hentai encompass different approaches to the aforementioned, so the above contexts may be differently used.

@SchrodingerZ No. NTR is all about a character stealing mc's (or the opposite) girlfriend because he has a bigger dick to fuck with. If all hentai "idealizes" sex, then why are there stories that have relationship/plot progress as their main focus? Why is there softcore hentai? In case of NTR, it focuses more on the cock size comparison between characters. It's more of a trifling fantasy of a desperate cuck than an actual ideal.
